data.persona: I'm a traveler. Rather than settling down in one town, I feel compelled to go from place to place. I make money by carrying news from town to town, by bringing small objects to sell such as needles and lace, and by telling interesting stories. As soon as I have traveling money, I move on to the next place.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Tower.
The walls and are made of marble and trimmed in gold.  So too are the winding stairs that lead up to the observation deck.  Ivy lines the outside of the walls and sprawls all the way up the side to just near the top of the tower.  The tower itself is intimidating for those who dare to approach.  The tower stands tall so as to see out way across the beautiful land it watches over.
There's an a moat, a wall, a Stair, a vessel, a beautiful land, a castle, an observation deck, a countryside, a beautiful farmland, an a drawbridge, and a gold here.
The castle guards and the bodyguard are here.

You are carrying a satchel, and wearing a hats and a ceremonial hat.
